Test Name: Factor XIII Deficiency, F13A1 and F13B Genes Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Purpose: To accurately detect and analyze genetic variants in the F13A1 and F13B genes for diagnosing Factor XIII deficiency.
Equipment: Automated NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), DNA extraction kits, library preparation kits, thermal cycler, Qubit/Nanodrop quantification instruments, PCR machines, bioinformatics software
